questions.question: What is our universal condition according to Romans 3:23?
questions.answer: For all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God.

questions.question: What is the consequence of sin mentioned in Romans 6:23?
questions.answer: For the wages of sin is death, but the gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.

questions.question: How does God's love manifest according to Romans 5:8?
questions.answer: But God demonstrates His own love for us in this: While we were still sinners, Christ died for us.

questions.question: What does Romans 10:9 say about confessing Jesus as Lord?
questions.answer: If you declare with your mouth, 'Jesus is Lord,' and believe in your heart that God raised him from the dead, you will be saved.

questions.question: What does Romans 10:13 say about calling on the name of the Lord?
questions.answer: Everyone who calls on the name of the Lord will be saved.
